data: Allen B. Stern Professor 211 Gallalee Hall (205) 348-3043 astern@ua.edu Tuesday, 10:45-12 noon; Thursday, 10:45-12 noon; or by appointment PhD, Syracuse University, 1980 Professor Stern’s current research interests include solitons, topological field theories, duality, quantum groups, and applications of noncommutative geometry. For a complete publication list, go to SPIRES . Professor Stern received his doctoral degree from Syracuse University in 1980. He joined the faculty of The University of Alabama in 1990 .
